title: Introduction to Leadership - Concepts and Practice 3rd
description:
Title: Introduction to Leadership: Concepts and Practice 3rd Edition 
Author: Peter G. Northouse
Format: PDF 
Paperback: 348 pages 
Publisher: SAGE Publications (Jan 7, 2014) 
Language: English 
ISBN-10: 1452259666

Grounded in leadership theory, this applied and reader-friendly text emphasizes the invaluable â€œhow-toâ€ components of leadership. Focusing on developing the unique strengths of the leader, it presents an array of interactive learning tools that help readers identify their leadership preferences, reflect on leadership opportunities and experiences, and strengthen their leadership skills." (barnesandnoble.com)
